item.title: How did I land a Cloud Architect Role at Amazon
item.description: This guide is for experienced professionals who are looking to build their career into Cloud domain and may be concerned that landing a job at Amazon is beyond reasonable. Someone had told me as well that the job market is uncertain and I should stick to my previous position.
